title: Boris Johnson – 2019 Speech Launching General Election
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, at Downing Street, London on 6 November 2019.
content:
Good afternoon, I’ve just been to see Her Majesty the Queen earlier on and she agreed to dissolve Parliament for an election.
